verses.verse: The burden <WH4853> of the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> for <WH5921> Israel, <WH3478> saith <WH5002> the LORD, <WH3068> which stretcheth forth <WH5186> the heavens, <WH8064> and layeth the foundation <WH3245> of the earth, <WH776> and formeth <WH3335> the spirit <WH7307> of man <WH120> within <WH7130> him.

Behold, <WH2009> I <WH595> will make <WH7760> <WH853> Jerusalem <WH3389> a cup <WH5592> of trembling <WH7478> unto all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> round about, <WH5439> when they shall be <WH1961> in the siege <WH4692> both <WH1571> against <WH5921> Judah <WH3063> and against <WH5921> Jerusalem. <WH3389>

And in that <WH1931> day <WH3117> will I make <WH7760> <WH853> Jerusalem <WH3389> a burdensome <WH4614> stone <WH68> for all <WH3605> people: <WH5971> all <WH3605> that burden <WH6006> themselves with it shall be cut in pieces, <WH8295> <WH8295> though all <WH3605> the people <WH1471> of the earth <WH776> be gathered together <WH622> against <WH5921> it.

In that <WH1931> day, <WH3117> saith <WH5002> the LORD, <WH3068> I will smite <WH5221> every <WH3605> horse <WH5483> with astonishment, <WH8541> and his rider <WH7392> with madness: <WH7697> and I will open <WH6491> <WH853> mine eyes <WH5869> upon <WH5921> the house <WH1004> of Judah, <WH3063> and will smite <WH5221> every <WH3605> horse <WH5483> of the people <WH5971> with blindness. <WH5788>

And the governors <WH441> of Judah <WH3063> shall say <WH559> in their heart, <WH3820> The inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem <WH3389> shall be my strength <WH556> in the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> their God. <WH430>

In that <WH1931> day <WH3117> will I make <WH7760> <WH853> the governors <WH441> of Judah <WH3063> like a hearth <WH3595> of fire <WH784> among the wood, <WH6086> and like a torch <WH3940> of fire <WH784> in a sheaf; <WH5995> and they shall devour <WH398> <WH853> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> round about, <WH5439> on <WH5921> the right hand <WH3225> and on <WH5921> the left: <WH8040> and Jerusalem <WH3389> shall be inhabited <WH3427> again <WH5750> in her own place, <WH8478> even in Jerusalem. <WH3389>

The LORD <WH3068> also shall save <WH3467> <WH853> the tents <WH168> of Judah <WH3063> first, <WH7223> that <WH4616> the glory <WH8597> of the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732> and the glory <WH8597> of the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem <WH3389> do not <WH3808> magnify <WH1431> themselves against <WH5921> Judah. <WH3063>

In that <WH1931> day <WH3117> shall the LORD <WH3068> defend <WH1598> <WH1157> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem; <WH3389> and he that is feeble <WH3782> among them at that <WH1931> day <WH3117> shall be <WH1961> as David; <WH1732> and the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732> shall be as God, <WH430> as the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> before <WH6440> them.

And it shall come to pass <WH1961> in that <WH1931> day, <WH3117> that I will seek <WH1245> to destroy <WH8045> <WH853> all <WH3605> the nations <WH1471> that come <WH935> against <WH5921> Jerusalem. <WH3389>

And I will pour <WH8210> upon <WH5921> the house <WH1004> of David, <WH1732> and upon <WH5921> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> the spirit <WH7307> of grace <WH2580> and of supplications: <WH8469> and they shall look <WH5027> upon <WH413> me <WH853> whom <WH834> they have pierced, <WH1856> and they shall mourn <WH5594> for <WH5921> him, as one mourneth <WH4553> for <WH5921> his only <WH3173> son, and shall be in bitterness <WH4843> for <WH5921> him, as one that is in bitterness <WH4843> for <WH5921> his firstborn. <WH1060>
In that <WH1931> day <WH3117> shall there be a great <WH1431> mourning <WH4553> in Jerusalem, <WH3389> as the mourning <WH4553> of Hadadrimmon <WH1910> in the valley <WH1237> of Megiddon. <WH4023>

And the land <WH776> shall mourn, <WH5594> every family <WH4940> <WH4940> apart; <WH905> the family <WH4940> of the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732> apart, <WH905> and their wives <WH802> apart; <WH905> the family <WH4940> of the house <WH1004> of Nathan <WH5416> apart, <WH905> and their wives <WH802> apart; <WH905>

The family <WH4940> of the house <WH1004> of Levi <WH3878> apart, <WH905> and their wives <WH802> apart; <WH905> the family <WH4940> of Shimei <WH8097> apart, <WH905> and their wives <WH802> apart; <WH905>
All <WH3605> the families <WH4940> that remain, <WH7604> every family <WH4940> <WH4940> apart, <WH905> and their wives <WH802> apart. <WH905>
